Quote.Author: Alec Baldwin
Quote.QuoteValue: I just can't live in New York anymore

Quote.Author: Aleister Crowley
Quote.QuoteValue: Do what thou wilt shall be the whole of the law

Quote.Author: Aleister Crowley
Quote.QuoteValue: To me a book is a message from the gods to mankind; or, if not, should never be published at all

Quote.Author: Aleister Crowley
Quote.QuoteValue: The people who have really made history are the martyrs

Quote.Author: Aleister Crowley
Quote.QuoteValue: In the absence of willpower the most complete collection of virtues and talents is wholly worthless

Quote.Author: Aleister Crowley
Quote.QuoteValue: The pious pretense that evil does not exist only makes it vague, enormous and menacing

Quote.Author: Aleister Crowley
Quote.QuoteValue: Ordinary morality is only for ordinary people

Quote.Author: Aleister Crowley
Quote.QuoteValue: Intolerance is evidence of impotence

Quote.Author: Aleister Crowley
Quote.QuoteValue: Paganism is wholesome because it faces the facts of life

Quote.Author: Aleister Crowley
Quote.QuoteValue: Falsehood is invariably the child of fear in one form or another

Quote.Author: Aleister Crowley
Quote.QuoteValue: I have never grown out of the infantile belief that the universe was made for me to suck

Quote.Author: Alejandro Gonzalez Inarritu
Quote.QuoteValue: Cinema is universal, beyond flags and borders and passports

Quote.Author: Alejandro Gonzalez Inarritu
Quote.QuoteValue: Life and death are illusions. We are in a constant state of transformation

Quote.Author: Alejandro Gonzalez Inarritu
Quote.QuoteValue: I really didn't want to become branded as 'that multistructural guy.'

Quote.Author: Alejandro Gonzalez Inarritu
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Birdman' came from a very beautiful side of me, from a part of honesty and surrender about things

Quote.Author: Alejandro Gonzalez Inarritu
Quote.QuoteValue: Filmmaking can give you everything, but at the same time, it can take everything from you

Quote.Author: Alejandro Gonzalez Inarritu
Quote.QuoteValue: I have always said that innocence is much more powerful than experience

Quote.Author: Alejandro Gonzalez Inarritu
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Biutiful' is not about death. It's about life. It's a hymn to life

Quote.Author: Alejandro Gonzalez Inarritu
Quote.QuoteValue: Movies started out as an extension of a magic trick, so making a spectacle is part of the game

Quote.Author: Alejandro Gonzalez Inarritu
Quote.QuoteValue: Fear of the unknown is a great creative partner

Quote.Author: Alejandro Gonzalez Inarritu
Quote.QuoteValue: As a city, it is always compelling. But every day in Mexico City, I give thanks that I am alive

Quote.Author: Alejandro Jodorowsky
Quote.QuoteValue: People say I am mad. I am not mad. I am trying to heal my soul

Quote.Author: Alejandro Jodorowsky
Quote.QuoteValue: My ego every day is more and more polite. I tame it

Quote.Author: Alejandro Jodorowsky
Quote.QuoteValue: Birds born in cages think that flying is a disease

Quote.Author: Alejandro Jodorowsky
Quote.QuoteValue: We all exist in our own personal reality of craziness

Quote.Author: Alejandro Jodorowsky
Quote.QuoteValue: Five cats and a woman. That is all I need in life

Quote.Author: Alejandro Jodorowsky
Quote.QuoteValue: If God gives you chocolate, you open your mouth, no?

Quote.Author: Alejandro Jodorowsky
Quote.QuoteValue: I am like the rain: I go where I'm needed

Quote.Author: Alejandro Jodorowsky
Quote.QuoteValue: We are all working for the immortality of the human consciousness

Quote.Author: Alejandro Jodorowsky
Quote.QuoteValue: I am not a normal person. I am living in a normal body, but my mind is not normal

Quote.Author: Alejandro Jodorowsky
Quote.QuoteValue: My wife is 37 years younger than me. I don't feel the difference

Quote.Author: Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn
Quote.QuoteValue: The battleline between good and evil runs through the heart of every man

Quote.Author: Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn
Quote.QuoteValue: Talent is always conscious of its own abundance, and does not object to sharing

Quote.Author: Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn
Quote.QuoteValue: A state of war only serves as an excuse for domestic tyranny

Quote.Author: Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn
Quote.QuoteValue: In our country the lie has become not just a moral category but a pillar of the State

Quote.Author: Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn
Quote.QuoteValue: Not everything has a name. Some things lead us into a realm beyond words

Quote.Author: Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn
Quote.QuoteValue: The salvation of mankind lies only in making everything the concern of all

Quote.Author: Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn
Quote.QuoteValue: If one is forever cautious, can one remain a human being?

Quote.Author: Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn
Quote.QuoteValue: For us in Russia communism is a dead dog. For many people in the West, it is still a living lion

Quote.Author: Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn
Quote.QuoteValue: A man is happy so long as he chooses to be happy and nothing can stop him

Quote.Author: Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything you add to the truth subtracts from the truth

Quote.Author: Alessia Cara
Quote.QuoteValue: Every time I sing, it it's a reminder to myself that I have to be confident

Quote.Author: Alessia Cara
Quote.QuoteValue: I keep my hair curly and natural because I really just wanna show who I am

Quote.Author: Alessia Cara
Quote.QuoteValue: Ninety per cent of my family are hairdressers, and the other 10% are construction workers

Quote.Author: Alessia Cara
Quote.QuoteValue: I was always so scared to sing in front of people. That was kind of my weird thing

Quote.Author: Alessia Cara
Quote.QuoteValue: I was a troublemaking kid

Quote.Author: Alessia Cara
Quote.QuoteValue: I wanted to get through high school anonymously

Quote.Author: Alessia Cara
Quote.QuoteValue: Flannel shirts, denim, Converse, a guitar, messy hair? That's literally me

Quote.Author: Alessia Cara
Quote.QuoteValue: I was a very strange child

Quote.Author: Alessia Cara
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't really dance. I don't drink or smoke. Being at parties is very awkward

Quote.Author: Alessia Cara
Quote.QuoteValue: I barely have time to think. But the best way to stay grounded is to take it one day at a time

Quote.Author: Alex Berenson
Quote.QuoteValue: If only the human body could handle trauma as well as biotechnology stocks do

Quote.Author: Alex Berenson
Quote.QuoteValue: Even a war zone looks peaceful in most places, most of the time

Quote.Author: Alex Berenson
Quote.QuoteValue: Publicly traded United States companies report sales and profits to investors every quarter

Quote.Author: Alex Berenson
Quote.QuoteValue: Never underestimate the power of Abby Joseph Cohen

Quote.Author: Alex Berenson
Quote.QuoteValue: Volatility may be rising simply because investors must digest more information every day

Quote.Author: Alex Berenson
Quote.QuoteValue: Downhill track sports like luge are technology battles, as exciting as a NASCAR qualifying day

Quote.Author: Alex Berenson
Quote.QuoteValue: Plumbing is usually boring

Quote.Author: Alex Berenson
Quote.QuoteValue: Individual income can grow only as fast as productivity rises

Quote.Author: Alex Berenson
Quote.QuoteValue: Even so, sometimes I wish I did have a little bit more flair in my language

Quote.Author: Alex Berenson
Quote.QuoteValue: Sergeant Bergdahl may have broken any number of military laws

Quote.Author: Alex Rodriguez
Quote.QuoteValue: I just don't see the light. Where is the light? What am I in this for?

Quote.Author: Alex Rodriguez
Quote.QuoteValue: I had a great year and left my guts out on the field

Quote.Author: Alex Rodriguez
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a terrible singer. I feel lucky to play baseball. You can't be gifted in everything

Quote.Author: Alex Rodriguez
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't trust anyone except a very, very few people

Quote.Author: Alex Rodriguez
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm never happy with my performance

Quote.Author: Alex Rodriguez
Quote.QuoteValue: Babe Ruth is an icon, in sports and in our society

Quote.Author: Alex Rodriguez
Quote.QuoteValue: I never like to think about going back; I only look forward

Quote.Author: Alex Rodriguez
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm guilty for a lot of things

Quote.Author: Alex Rodriguez
Quote.QuoteValue: When I grew up, baseball was the No. 1 sport

Quote.Author: Alex Rodriguez
Quote.QuoteValue: There are a lot of people who don't like me

Quote.Author: Alexander McQueen
Quote.QuoteValue: Fashion should be a form of escapism, and not a form of imprisonment

Quote.Author: Alexander McQueen
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not interested in being liked

Quote.Author: Alexander McQueen
Quote.QuoteValue: There has to be a balance between your mental satisfaction and the financial needs of your company

Quote.Author: Alexander McQueen
Quote.QuoteValue: I never look at other people's work. My mind has to be completely focused on my own illusions

Quote.Author: Alexander McQueen
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to empower women. I want people to be afraid of the women I dress

Quote.Author: Alexander McQueen
Quote.QuoteValue: Give me time and I'll give you a revolution

Quote.Author: Alexander McQueen
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want to be too proud, but I have a good personal style

Quote.Author: Alexander McQueen
Quote.QuoteValue: I've had good times; I've had bad times

Quote.Author: Alexander McQueen
Quote.QuoteValue: You can only go forward by making mistakes

Quote.Author: Alexander McQueen
Quote.QuoteValue: Rap music's been around for too long now to be inspirational. The words are, but the music isn't

Quote.Author: Alexander Pope
Quote.QuoteValue: To be angry is to revenge the faults of others on ourselves

Quote.Author: Alexander Pope
Quote.QuoteValue: A work of art that contains theories is like an object on which the price tag has been left

Quote.Author: Alexander Pope
Quote.QuoteValue: To err is human; to forgive, divine

Quote.Author: Alexander Pope
Quote.QuoteValue: On life's vast ocean diversely we sail. Reasons the card, but passion the gale

Quote.Author: Alexander Pope
Quote.QuoteValue: A little learning is a dangerous thing; Drink deep, or taste not the Pierian spring

Quote.Author: Alexander Pope
Quote.QuoteValue: On wrongs swift vengeance waits

Quote.Author: Alexander Pope
Quote.QuoteValue: The ruling passion, be it what it will. The ruling passion conquers reason still

Quote.Author: Alexander Pope
Quote.QuoteValue: The difference is too nice - Where ends the virtue or begins the vice

Quote.Author: Alexander Pope
Quote.QuoteValue: All nature is but art unknown to thee

Quote.Author: Alexander Pope
Quote.QuoteValue: Blessed is the man who expects nothing, for he shall never be disappointed was the ninth beatitude

Quote.Author: Alexander the Great
Quote.QuoteValue: I am not afraid of an army of lions led by a sheep; I am afraid of an army of sheep led by a lion

Quote.Author: Alexander the Great
Quote.QuoteValue: There is nothing impossible to him who will try

Quote.Author: Alexander the Great
Quote.QuoteValue: I am dying from the treatment of too many physicians

Quote.Author: Alexander the Great
Quote.QuoteValue: Heaven cannot brook two suns, nor earth two masters

Quote.Author: Alexander the Great
Quote.QuoteValue: I am indebted to my father for living, but to my teacher for living well

Quote.Author: Alexander the Great
Quote.QuoteValue: How great are the dangers I face to win a good name in Athens

Quote.Author: Alexander the Great
Quote.QuoteValue: A tomb now suffices him for whom the whole world was not sufficient

Quote.Author: Alexander the Great
Quote.QuoteValue: Remember upon the conduct of each depends the fate of all

Quote.Author: Alexander the Great
Quote.QuoteValue: If I were not Alexander, I would be Diogenes

Quote.Author: Alexander the Great
Quote.QuoteValue: I do not pilfer victory

Quote.Author: Alexandra Daddario
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a combination between extreme insecurity and extreme confidence

Quote.Author: Alexandra Daddario
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm really easily affected by horror films. I have pretty strong reactions to them

Quote.Author: Alexandra Daddario
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm very into fantasy films

Quote.Author: Alexandra Daddario
Quote.QuoteValue: I love stories about people that, whatever situation they're in, you can relate to them in a way

Quote.Author: Alexandra Daddario
Quote.QuoteValue: Finding a stylist is a little like finding a date; you have to find who is right for you

Quote.Author: Alexandra Daddario
Quote.QuoteValue: I was obsessed with Nancy Drew growing up - I couldn't get enough

Quote.Author: Alexandra Daddario
Quote.QuoteValue: You never know what's really going to hit

Quote.Author: Alexandra Daddario
Quote.QuoteValue: I do consider myself to be a smart, tough girl

Quote.Author: Alexandra Daddario
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't expect anything crazy to happen from 'True Detective.'

Quote.Author: Alexandra Daddario
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm just really excited to be doing what I love, and I think that's the best part about all of this

Quote.Author: Alexei Sayle
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't do comedy with a beard

Quote.Author: Alexei Sayle
Quote.QuoteValue: People used to think I was just a shouty comic but I was doing stuff about Sartre

Quote.Author: Alexei Sayle
Quote.QuoteValue: Most of my friends are women - I quite fancied being a woman in a way

Quote.Author: Alexei Sayle
Quote.QuoteValue: I am quite girly

Quote.Author: Alexei Sayle
Quote.QuoteValue: It always seemed to be a constant that my parents were political

Quote.Author: Alexei Sayle
Quote.QuoteValue: Honestly, sometimes I get really fed up of my subconscious - it's like it's got a mind of its own

Quote.Author: Alexei Sayle
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm an intellectual

Quote.Author: Alexei Sayle
Quote.QuoteValue: I wanted to write about how people's beliefs shift

Quote.Author: Alexei Sayle
Quote.QuoteValue: People aren't universally heroic

Quote.Author: Alexei Sayle
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm distinct, really

Quote.Author: Alexis de Tocqueville
Quote.QuoteValue: There are many men of principle in both parties in America, but there is no party of principle

Quote.Author: Alexis de Tocqueville
Quote.QuoteValue: History is a gallery of pictures in which there are few originals and many copies

Quote.Author: Alexis de Tocqueville
Quote.QuoteValue: Liberty cannot be established without morality, nor morality without faith

Quote.Author: Alexis de Tocqueville
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is to be entered upon with courage

Quote.Author: Alexis de Tocqueville
Quote.QuoteValue: When the past no longer illuminates the future, the spirit walks in darkness

Quote.Author: Alexis de Tocqueville
Quote.QuoteValue: Those that despise people will never get the best out of others and themselves

Quote.Author: Alexis de Tocqueville
Quote.QuoteValue: The whole life of an American is passed like a game of chance, a revolutionary crisis, or a battle

Quote.Author: Alexis de Tocqueville
Quote.QuoteValue: The Indian knew how to live without wants, to suffer without complaint, and to die singing

Quote.Author: Alexis de Tocqueville
Quote.QuoteValue: In politics shared hatreds are almost always the basis of friendships

Quote.Author: Alexis de Tocqueville
Quote.QuoteValue: The power of the periodical press is second only to that of the people

Quote.Author: Alfred Adler
Quote.QuoteValue: My difficulties belong to me!

Quote.Author: Alfred Adler
Quote.QuoteValue: Exaggerated sensitiveness is an expression of the feeling of inferiority

Quote.Author: Alfred Adler
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no such thing as talent. There is pressure

Quote.Author: Alfred Adler
Quote.QuoteValue: The chief danger in life is that you may take too many precautions

Quote.Author: Alfred Adler
Quote.QuoteValue: The only normal people are the ones you don't know very well

Quote.Author: Alfred Adler
Quote.QuoteValue: It is always easier to fight for one's principles than to live up to them

Quote.Author: Alfred Adler
Quote.QuoteValue: The neurotic is nailed to the cross of his fiction

Quote.Author: Alfred Adler
Quote.QuoteValue: Man knows much more than he understands

Quote.Author: Alfred Adler
Quote.QuoteValue: Our modern states are preparing for war without even knowing the future enemy

Quote.Author: Alfred Adler
Quote.QuoteValue: To all those who walk the path of human cooperation war must appear loathsome and inhuman

Quote.Author: Alfred Hitchcock
Quote.QuoteValue: Revenge is sweet and not fattening

Quote.Author: Alfred Hitchcock
Quote.QuoteValue: A good film is when the price of the dinner, the theatre admission and the babysitter were worth it

Quote.Author: Alfred Hitchcock
Quote.QuoteValue: Always make the audience suffer as much as possible

Quote.Author: Alfred Hitchcock
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no terror in the bang, only in the anticipation of it

Quote.Author: Alfred Hitchcock
Quote.QuoteValue: What is drama but life with the dull bits cut out

Quote.Author: Alfred Hitchcock
Quote.QuoteValue: A lot of movies are about life, mine are like a slice of cake

Quote.Author: Alfred Hitchcock
Quote.QuoteValue: Blondes make the best victims. They're like virgin snow that shows up the bloody footprints

Quote.Author: Alfred Hitchcock
Quote.QuoteValue: Drama is life with the dull bits cut out

Quote.Author: Alfred Hitchcock
Quote.QuoteValue: The more successful the villain, the more successful the picture

Quote.Author: Alfred Hitchcock
Quote.QuoteValue: In feature films the director is God; in documentary films God is the director

Quote.Author: Alfred Lord Tennyson
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Tis better to have loved and lost than never to have loved at all

Quote.Author: Alfred Lord Tennyson
Quote.QuoteValue: Hope smiles from the threshold of the year to come, whispering, 'It will be happier.'

Quote.Author: Alfred Lord Tennyson
Quote.QuoteValue: To strive, to seek, to find, and not to yield

Quote.Author: Alfred Lord Tennyson
Quote.QuoteValue: Knowledge comes, but wisdom lingers

Quote.Author: Alfred Lord Tennyson
Quote.QuoteValue: There lives more faith in honest doubt, believe me, than in half the creeds

Quote.Author: Alfred Lord Tennyson
Quote.QuoteValue: Let the great world spin for ever down the ringing grooves of change

Quote.Author: Alfred Lord Tennyson
Quote.QuoteValue: Who is wise in love, love most, say least

Quote.Author: Alfred Lord Tennyson
Quote.QuoteValue: My strength is as the strength of ten, because my heart is pure

Quote.Author: Alfred Lord Tennyson
Quote.QuoteValue: Theirs is not to make reply: Theirs is not to reason why: Theirs is but to do and die

Quote.Author: Alfred Lord Tennyson
Quote.QuoteValue: And out of darkness came the hands that reach thro' nature, moulding men

Quote.Author: Alfred North Whitehead
Quote.QuoteValue: The art of progress is to preserve order amid change and to preserve change amid order

Quote.Author: Alfred North Whitehead
Quote.QuoteValue: True courage is not the brutal force of vulgar heroes, but the firm resolve of virtue and reason

Quote.Author: Alfred North Whitehead
Quote.QuoteValue: Art attracts us only by what it reveals of our most secret self

Quote.Author: Alfred North Whitehead
Quote.QuoteValue: Almost all new ideas have a certain aspect of foolishness when they are first produced

Quote.Author: Alfred North Whitehead
Quote.QuoteValue: Not ignorance, but ignorance of ignorance, is the death of knowledge

Quote.Author: Alfred North Whitehead
Quote.QuoteValue: Speak out in acts; the time for words has passed, and only deeds will suffice

Quote.Author: Alfred North Whitehead
Quote.QuoteValue: When you're average, you're just as close to the bottom as you are the top

Quote.Author: Alfred North Whitehead
Quote.QuoteValue: I would be a billionaire if I was looking to be a selfish boss. That's not me

Quote.Author: Alfred North Whitehead
Quote.QuoteValue: Periods of tranquility are seldom prolific of creative achievement. Mankind has to be stirred up

Quote.Author: Alfred North Whitehead
Quote.QuoteValue: Ideas won't keep; something must be done about them

Quote.Author: Alice Cooper
Quote.QuoteValue: The two most joyous times of the year are Christmas morning and the end of school

Quote.Author: Alice Cooper
Quote.QuoteValue: The hippies wanted peace and love. We wanted Ferraris, blondes and switchblades

Quote.Author: Alice Cooper
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm very romantic, I'm extremely romantic. I date my wife

Quote.Author: Alice Cooper
Quote.QuoteValue: There was a period of time when I thought I had to be Alice Cooper all the time

Quote.Author: Alice Cooper
Quote.QuoteValue: We wanted it more live and raw. We didn't want a studio sound

Quote.Author: Alice Cooper
Quote.QuoteValue: We just set it up and recorded it the way we played it. But that was the way we played it then

Quote.Author: Alice Cooper
Quote.QuoteValue: We play it differently now. If we did the album now it would be different

Quote.Author: Alice Cooper
Quote.QuoteValue: We try to be as much involved in our product as possible, because then it's us

Quote.Author: Alice Cooper
Quote.QuoteValue: Yet I was Marilyn Manson - times 10

Quote.Author: Alice Cooper
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm 18 and I like it!

Quote.Author: Alice Walker
Quote.QuoteValue: In search of my mother's garden, I found my own

Quote.Author: Alice Walker
Quote.QuoteValue: How simple a thing it seems to me that to know ourselves as we are, we must know our mothers names

Quote.Author: Alice Walker
Quote.QuoteValue: I think it pisses God off if you walk by the color purple in a field somewhere and don't notice it

Quote.Author: Alice Walker
Quote.QuoteValue: No person is your friend who demands your silence, or denies your right to grow

Quote.Author: Alice Walker
Quote.QuoteValue: The most common way people give up their power is by thinking they don't have any

Quote.Author: Alice Walker
Quote.QuoteValue: Expect nothing. Live frugally on surprise

Quote.Author: Alice Walker
Quote.QuoteValue: Is solace anywhere more comforting than that in the arms of a sister

Quote.Author: Alice Walker
Quote.QuoteValue: Womanist is to feminist as purple is to lavender

Quote.Author: Alice Walker
Quote.QuoteValue: Nobody is as powerful as we make them out to be

Quote.Author: Alice Walker
Quote.QuoteValue: Tea to the English is really a picnic indoors

Quote.Author: Alice Waters
Quote.QuoteValue: The decisions you make are a choice of values that reflect your life in every way

Quote.Author: Alice Waters
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm an optimist. I'm hopeful

Quote.Author: Alice Waters
Quote.QuoteValue: Whenever I want to know how to cook something, I can't ask one chef - I have to ask six

Quote.Author: Alice Waters
Quote.QuoteValue: I know once people get connected to real food, they never change back

Quote.Author: Alice Waters
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a fireplace in my kitchen that I light every night, no matter what

Quote.Author: Alice Waters
Quote.QuoteValue: I used to think that I wanted to be a hat maker, but I don't think that would have worked out

Quote.Author: Alice Waters
Quote.QuoteValue: I think health is the outcome of finding a balance and some satisfaction at the table

Quote.Author: Alice Waters
Quote.QuoteValue: Food isn't like anything else. It's something precious. It's not a commodity

Quote.Author: Alice Waters
Quote.QuoteValue: To have a basic ingredient that can be prepared a million different ways is a beautiful thing

Quote.Author: Alice Waters
Quote.QuoteValue: I try not to do anything that's immoral

Quote.Author: Alicia Keys
Quote.QuoteValue: My mom is definitely my rock

Quote.Author: Alicia Keys
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not ashamed of what I am and that I have curves and that I'm thick. I like my body

Quote.Author: Alicia Keys
Quote.QuoteValue: Maturity and experience are part of my liberation

Quote.Author: Alicia Keys
Quote.QuoteValue: I always want to stay focused on who I am, even as I'm discovering who I am

Quote.Author: Alicia Keys
Quote.QuoteValue: Soul music is timeless

Quote.Author: Alicia Keys
Quote.QuoteValue: I see what happens when one gets very attached to material things. That's just not what my life is

Quote.Author: Alicia Keys
Quote.QuoteValue: Simplicity makes me happy

Quote.Author: Alicia Keys
Quote.QuoteValue: But when I first fell in love with the piano, I knew it was me. I was dying to play

Quote.Author: Alicia Keys
Quote.QuoteValue: I love the written word so much, I know it's gonna flow naturally

Quote.Author: Alicia Keys
Quote.QuoteValue: I really like to live my life in a low-key fashion

Quote.Author: Alison Krauss
Quote.QuoteValue: Oh Mr. Webster could never define what's being said between your heart and mine

Quote.Author: Alison Krauss
Quote.QuoteValue: I love being in the world of the unknown

Quote.Author: Alison Krauss
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't look for bliss, just contentment

Quote.Author: Alison Krauss
Quote.QuoteValue: If you don't know what makes green, you're going to try every color combination

Quote.Author: Alison Krauss
Quote.QuoteValue: I think you translate emotion better when you take your hands off

Quote.Author: Alison Krauss
Quote.QuoteValue: You say it best, when you say nothing at all

Quote.Author: Alison Krauss
Quote.QuoteValue: A whole album to one writer - now that would be really interesting

Quote.Author: Alison Krauss
Quote.QuoteValue: I love hard singing

Quote.Author: Alison Krauss
Quote.QuoteValue: People are always very nice

Quote.Author: Alison Krauss
Quote.QuoteValue: Growing up, we had folk records

Quote.Author: Allen Ginsberg
Quote.QuoteValue: Follow your inner moonlight; don't hide the madness

Quote.Author: Allen Ginsberg
Quote.QuoteValue: Democracy! Bah! When I hear that I reach for my feather boa!

Quote.Author: Allen Ginsberg
Quote.QuoteValue: Poets are Damned... but See with the Eyes of Angels

Quote.Author: Allen Ginsberg
Quote.QuoteValue: I saw the best minds of my generation destroyed by madness, starving hysterical naked

Quote.Author: Allen Ginsberg
Quote.QuoteValue: Whoever controls the media, the images, controls the culture

Quote.Author: Allen Ginsberg
Quote.QuoteValue: The weight of the world is love. Under the burden of solitude, under the burden of dissatisfaction

Quote.Author: Allen Ginsberg
Quote.QuoteValue: America I'm putting my queer shoulder to the wheel

Quote.Author: Allen Ginsberg
Quote.QuoteValue: My own experience is that a certain kind of genius among students is best brought out in bed

Quote.Author: Allen Ginsberg
Quote.QuoteValue: America, how can I write a holy litany in your silly mood?

Quote.Author: Allen Ginsberg
Quote.QuoteValue: America, I've given you all and now I'm nothing

Quote.Author: Allen Iverson
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're from Virginia, then you know some white people from Poquoson don't like black people

Quote.Author: Allen Iverson
Quote.QuoteValue: Being an All-Star is everything

Quote.Author: Allen Iverson
Quote.QuoteValue: I failed, got back up. I failed, got back up

Quote.Author: Allen Iverson
Quote.QuoteValue: When you are not practicing, someone else is getting better

Quote.Author: Allen Iverson
Quote.QuoteValue: I just feel this is my planet

Quote.Author: Allen Iverson
Quote.QuoteValue: I made a lot of mistakes. And obviously, it cost me

Quote.Author: Allen Iverson
Quote.QuoteValue: I am sick of defending myself, and I am not going to keep on doing it

Quote.Author: Allen Iverson
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't care. I feel like if we don't make a trade, we have to get it done with what we've got

Quote.Author: Allen Iverson
Quote.QuoteValue: I had a lot of growing up to do. A lot of times, I learned the hard way

Quote.Author: Allen Iverson
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't watch college basketball

Quote.Author: Allison Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: My mom has beautiful eyes, and I inherited a lot of her rituals, accentuating eyes

Quote.Author: Allison Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a major breath person, so I always have gum, mints

Quote.Author: Allison Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a big Aqua fan. 'Barbie Girl' was a big deal growing up

Quote.Author: Allison Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to play a villain. I want to play a romantic heroine

Quote.Author: Allison Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a master assembler of Ikea furniture, in case anyone wants to know

Quote.Author: Allison Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: I love seeing blank days in my calendar

Quote.Author: Allison Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: It's safe to say I'm a comedy nerd. I listen to so many podcasts. I just love to laugh

Quote.Author: Allison Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: I was only allowed only to watch public television until I was 12 years old

Quote.Author: Allison Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: I am not someone who thinks that a million products will mean that you'll look perfect
